Posts.Content: Jul 14, 2018 10:03AM Dthayer wrote: Yes, I have read that certain drugs can cause skin dryness. I am exexperiencing this as I approach the third of eight rounds of chemo. When I underwent chemotherapy for a first bc diagnosis four years ago, I found the opposite: My skin was very moist and remained so throughout chemo.
Posts.Title: Dry skin & wrinkles after chemo? jenlee Dthayer
